reviewText: My boys (4 yrs and 2 yrs) love this video. Love is an understatement. They watch it over and over. They watched the episode "Harold in the Dark" and now are scared every night when they go to bed. The point of the episode, not to be scared of the dark, was lost on them. All they saw is the ghosts and now they're scared.

This is a wonderful series of little programs.  Stays true to the Harold books with wonderful music and animation.  Addresses many childhood issues, including the death of a goldfish, the difficulties of having a real dog instead of a stuffed one, with great sensitivity.
Purchased because I already own another in the series and this one is as good as the first.  Children love it.  It is non violent, funny, and simple.
I purchased this for my two grandchildren.  They have watched this DVD over and over and love the stories on it. I would recommend this DVD.

I love Harold and the Purple Crayon.  I buy Harold for every birthday party or baby shower. Special memories watching Harold with my grandsons as they grew. Every child should experience Harold and the Purple Crayon and let their imagination soar!

The kids love Harold, but the production values of this HBO series is exceptional enough for adults to watch, and I find myself drawn in myself.  Harold himself is a very quiet, understated character, unlike many characters in popular children's media; he lacks the usual shrill voice or frenetic demeanor or tired theme songs.  The plots of these episodes vary but the emphasis, like the Crockett Johnson books, is on the simplicity of the purple crayon and Harold's imagination.  I wish more episodes could have been produced, but the ones done in this limited series at least stay true in spirit to the purity of innocence, whimsy, and fancifulness of a child's imagination.
Harold is awesome!  We love every episode.  Unlike other kid show we love to watch this one as a family.  He is so cute.
My son loves Harold! This is his second tape and he watches them all the time. I really like it for him to watch before bed, it helps settle him down. The cute imagination is great!
My granddaughter (who is almost 3) loves this movie! This way, she can watch her favorite television show even when it is not being broadcast.

This DVD features Sharon Stone as narrator and includes the following episodes from the HBO Family series:
1. Harold's Birthday Gift
2. A Blast from the Past (Dinosaurs)
3. Harold the Artiste
4. Harold's Walk on the Wild Side (Penguins & Monkeys)
5. Harold in the Dark (Where is the moon)
6. Future Clock (Harold in grown-up jobs)
7. Cowboy Harold
This is one of the only shows my 2-3 year old boy will watch, and Sharon Stone does an amazing job with the stories.
Very calm story lines, not a lot of hi-tech glitz jumping out at your child every 5 seconds. Calming and educational and fun enough to keep your little one entertained.
